DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Breast Imaging Screening Method Frequency
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol, for questions related to the frequency of screening breast imaging procedures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Breast Imaging Technique Screening Method
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest._Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy._Any method of detecting the presence of disease.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.
Any method of detecting the presence of disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Including all possibilities or occurring at regular intervals.: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

Concepts.definition: Including all possibilities or occurring at regular intervals.
A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
